people_also_ask.heading: NiGHTS is a genderless being, who according to the game's director, Takashi Iizuka, is up to the player to interpret. This means that they can be referred to by any pronouns (he/him, she/her or they/them) and that it is up for each player to choose how they want to see NiGHTS as (male, female or neither).
